intro: Kleinia, commonly known as the "kangaroo paw," is a genus of flowering plants native to South Africa. These plants are characterized by their unique, spurred flowers that resemble the paw of a kangaroo, hence their common name. Kleinia species typically grow in arid or semi-arid environments, showcasing adaptations to drought and high temperatures. They belong to the family Aizoaceae, also known as the "ice plant" family, and are known for their succulent leaves and vibrant, showy blooms. Many species are cultivated for their ornamental value in gardens and landscapes.
